00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : MPI_UpdateFG
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00018

00034 
00035  SUBROUTINE MPI_UpdateFG
00036 
00037 ! Common Variables
00038  USE Domain,      ONLY : xl, xlg, xsize3, xu, xug, yl, ylg, ysize3, yu, yug
00039  USE LBMParams,   ONLY : fbar, gbar
00040  USE FluidParams, ONLY : rho
00041  USE MPIParams
00042  USE MPI
00043  IMPLICIT NONE
00044 
00045 ! Local Variables
00046  INTEGER :: count, i, j
00047  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR, MPI_REQ
00048  INTEGER :: status(MPI_STATUS_SIZE)
00049 
00050 !--------- Save data for inward g components -----------------------------------
00051 ! X DIRECTION
00052  count = 1
00053  DO j = yl, yu
00054    g_west_snd(count)     = gbar(xlg,j,3)
00055    g_west_snd(count + 1) = gbar(xlg,j,6)
00056    g_west_snd(count + 2) = gbar(xlg,j,7)
00057 
00058    f_west_snd(count)     = fbar(xlg,j,3)
00059    f_west_snd(count + 1) = fbar(xlg,j,6)
00060    f_west_snd(count + 2) = fbar(xlg,j,7)
00061 
00062    g_east_snd(count)     = gbar(xug,j,1)
00063    g_east_snd(count + 1) = gbar(xug,j,5)
00064    g_east_snd(count + 2) = gbar(xug,j,8)
00065 
00066    f_east_snd(count)     = fbar(xug,j,1)
00067    f_east_snd(count + 1) = fbar(xug,j,5)
00068    f_east_snd(count + 2) = fbar(xug,j,8)
00069    count = count + 3
00070  END DO
00071 
00072 ! Y DIRECTION
00073  count = 1
00074  DO i = xl, xu
00075    g_south_snd(count)     = gbar(i,ylg,4)
00076    g_south_snd(count + 1) = gbar(i,ylg,7)
00077    g_south_snd(count + 2) = gbar(i,ylg,8)
00078 
00079    f_south_snd(count)     = fbar(i,ylg,4)
00080    f_south_snd(count + 1) = fbar(i,ylg,7)
00081    f_south_snd(count + 2) = fbar(i,ylg,8)
00082 
00083    g_north_snd(count)     = gbar(i,yug,2)
00084    g_north_snd(count + 1) = gbar(i,yug,5)
00085    g_north_snd(count + 2) = gbar(i,yug,6)
00086 
00087    f_north_snd(count)     = fbar(i,yug,2)
00088    f_north_snd(count + 1) = fbar(i,yug,5)
00089    f_north_snd(count + 2) = fbar(i,yug,6)
00090    count = count + 3
00091  END DO
00092  
00093 ! DIAGONALS
00094  g_ne_snd = gbar(xug,yug,5)
00095  g_nw_snd = gbar(xlg,yug,6)
00096  g_sw_snd = gbar(xlg,ylg,7)
00097  g_se_snd = gbar(xug,ylg,8)
00098  f_ne_snd = fbar(xug,yug,5)
00099  f_nw_snd = fbar(xlg,yug,6)
00100  f_sw_snd = fbar(xlg,ylg,7)
00101  f_se_snd = fbar(xug,ylg,8)
00102 
00103 !---------Exchange information using MPI calls----------------------------------
00104 ! X DIRECTION
00105  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_east_rcv, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00106  CALL MPI_SEND( f_west_snd, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00107  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00108 
00109  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_east_rcv, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00110  CALL MPI_SEND( g_west_snd, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00111  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00112 
00113  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_west_rcv, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00114  CALL MPI_SEND( f_east_snd, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00115  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00116 
00117  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_west_rcv, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00118  CALL MPI_SEND( g_east_snd, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00119  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00120 
00121 ! Y DIRECTION
00122  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_north_rcv, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00123  CALL MPI_SEND( f_south_snd, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00124  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00125 
00126  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_north_rcv, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00127  CALL MPI_SEND( g_south_snd, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00128  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00129 
00130  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_south_rcv, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00131  CALL MPI_SEND( f_north_snd, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00132  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00133 
00134  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_south_rcv, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00135  CALL MPI_SEND( g_north_snd, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00136  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00137 
00138 ! DIAGONALS
00139  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_ne_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00140  CALL MPI_SEND( g_sw_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00141  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00142 
00143  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_nw_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00144  CALL MPI_SEND( g_se_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00145  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00146 
00147  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_se_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00148  CALL MPI_SEND( g_nw_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00149  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00150 
00151  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_sw_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00152  CALL MPI_SEND( g_ne_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00153  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00154  
00155  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_ne_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00156  CALL MPI_SEND( f_sw_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00157  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00158 
00159  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_nw_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00160  CALL MPI_SEND( f_se_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00161  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00162 
00163  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_se_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00164  CALL MPI_SEND( f_nw_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00165  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00166 
00167  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_sw_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00168  CALL MPI_SEND( f_ne_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00169  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00170 
00171 
00172 !---------Update inward components of f and g in the real nodes-----------------
00173 ! X DIRECTION
00174  count = 1
00175  DO j = yl, yu
00176    gbar(xu,j,3) = g_east_rcv(count)
00177    gbar(xu,j,6) = g_east_rcv(count + 1)
00178    gbar(xu,j,7) = g_east_rcv(count + 2)
00179 
00180    fbar(xu,j,3) = f_east_rcv(count)
00181    fbar(xu,j,6) = f_east_rcv(count + 1)
00182    fbar(xu,j,7) = f_east_rcv(count + 2)
00183 
00184    gbar(xl,j,1) = g_west_rcv(count)
00185    gbar(xl,j,5) = g_west_rcv(count + 1)
00186    gbar(xl,j,8) = g_west_rcv(count + 2)
00187 
00188    fbar(xl,j,1) = f_west_rcv(count)
00189    fbar(xl,j,5) = f_west_rcv(count + 1)
00190    fbar(xl,j,8) = f_west_rcv(count + 2)
00191    count = count + 3
00192  END DO
00193 
00194 ! Y DIRECTION
00195  count = 1
00196  DO i = xl, xu
00197    gbar(i,yu,4) = g_north_rcv(count)
00198    gbar(i,yu,7) = g_north_rcv(count + 1)
00199    gbar(i,yu,8) = g_north_rcv(count + 2)
00200 
00201    fbar(i,yu,4) = f_north_rcv(count)
00202    fbar(i,yu,7) = f_north_rcv(count + 1)
00203    fbar(i,yu,8) = f_north_rcv(count + 2)
00204 
00205    gbar(i,yl,2) = g_south_rcv(count)
00206    gbar(i,yl,5) = g_south_rcv(count + 1)
00207    gbar(i,yl,6) = g_south_rcv(count + 2)
00208 
00209    fbar(i,yl,2) = f_south_rcv(count)
00210    fbar(i,yl,5) = f_south_rcv(count + 1)
00211    fbar(i,yl,6) = f_south_rcv(count + 2)
00212    count = count + 3
00213  END DO
00214 
00215 ! DIAGONALS
00216  gbar(xu,yu,7) = g_ne_rcv
00217  gbar(xl,yu,8) = g_nw_rcv
00218  gbar(xl,yl,5) = g_sw_rcv
00219  gbar(xu,yl,6) = g_se_rcv
00220  fbar(xu,yu,7) = f_ne_rcv
00221  fbar(xl,yu,8) = f_nw_rcv
00222  fbar(xl,yl,5) = f_sw_rcv
00223  fbar(xu,yl,6) = f_se_rcv
00224 
00225 
00226 !--------- Calculate the updated density ---------------------------------------
00227  DO j = yl, yu
00228    DO i = xl, xu
00229 
00230      rho(i,j) = fbar(i,j,0) + fbar(i,j,1) + fbar(i,j,2) + fbar(i,j,3) &
00231               + fbar(i,j,4) + fbar(i,j,5) + fbar(i,j,6) + fbar(i,j,7) &
00232               + fbar(i,j,8)
00233 
00234    END DO
00235  END DO
00236 
00237 
00238  RETURN
00239  END SUBROUTINE MPI_UpdateFG
00240
